edps.title: EDPS - Engineering Design Practices
edps.description: Create and manage engineering norms and standards
edps.greeting: Hello! I can help you create a new EDPS norm. What would you like to do?
edps.aiPrompt:
Great! I'll use the AI tool to help you create an EDPS norm. Please describe what kind of norm you want to create. Be as detailed as possible.

For example: "Create a norm for tire change procedure including safety steps and required tools"

messages.normCreated: ‚úÖ Success! Norm has been created with ID:
messages.normCreatedDetail: Would you like to link this norm to a DFMEA entry?
messages.errorSaving: ‚ùå Sorry, there was an error saving the norm. Please try again.
messages.aiGenerating: ü§ñ Generating EDPS norm with AI... This may take a moment.
messages.aiSuccessDetail: Would you like to review and save this norm?
messages.aiError: ‚ùå Sorry, there was an error using the AI tool:
messages.createManually: Would you like to create the norm manually instead?

dvp.title: DVP&R - Design Validation Plan & Results
dvp.description: Define test procedures and validation criteria
dvp.greeting: Hello! I can help you create a new DVP test procedure. What would you like to do?
dvp.aiPrompt:
Great! I'll use the AI tool to help you create a DVP test procedure. Please describe what kind of test you want to create.

For example: "Create a functional test for tire extraction force, measuring between 50N and 100N"

messages.testCreated: ‚úÖ Success! Test procedure has been created with ID:

messages.errorSaving: ‚ùå Sorry, there was an error saving the test. Please try again.

messages.createManually: Would you like to create the test manually instead?

dfmea.title: DFMEA - Design Failure Mode and Effects Analysis
dfmea.description: Analyze failure modes and link prevention/detection controls
dfmea.greeting: Hello! I can help you create a new DFMEA analysis. What would you like to do?
dfmea.aiPrompt:
Great! I'll use the AI tool to help you create a DFMEA analysis. Please describe the failure scenario you want to analyze.

For example: "Analyze tire mounting system failure - tire detachment during operation"

messages.dfmeaCreated: ‚úÖ Success! DFMEA analysis has been created with ID:

messages.createManually: Would you like to create the analysis manually instead?
